title: Paris 2024 Olympics and Paralympics Games - Importation customs formalities
description:
Accredited persons and accompanied luggages.

Declaration and authorisation of temporary admission and duty-free imports.

Communication of mandatory documents regarding the processing of specific goods (firearms, medicines, animals, etc).
zones: Ministère de l'Économie, des Finances et de la Souveraineté industrielle et numérique

service.nom: Direction générale des douanes et des droits indirects (DGDDI)
service.organisme: Direction générale des douanes et des droits indirects (DGDDI)

champDescriptors.label: I am a minor or a protected adult
Identity of the person legally responsible
ID document of the person legally responsible
Status
champDescriptors.description: Fill in the reason of your participation in the OG-PG.

champDescriptors.label: Departure country
champDescriptors.description: Fill in the country from which you are arriving.

champDescriptors.label: Flight number
champDescriptors.description: If you arrive by plane, please provide the flight number.

champDescriptors.label: Train number
champDescriptors.description: If you arrive by train, please provide the train number.

champDescriptors.label: Residential address in France
champDescriptors.description: Fill in the adress of the french lodging during the OG-PG

champDescriptors.label: Explanation
Do I carry goods destined to be permanently imported ?
Types of duty relief
champDescriptors.description: Tick the following boxes regarding the type of goods imported.
options: Pharmaceutical products used for an international sporting event
Materials intended for the Olympic and Paralympic Games (goodies, uniforms, etc.)

champDescriptors.label: Inventory of goods
champDescriptors.description: Join the .pdf file regarding the inventory of imported goods in accordance with Annex 6.5.7 of the Customs and Freight Guide edited by the Paris 2024 Organising Committee for the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

champDescriptors.label: Explanation
champDescriptors.description:
The temporary admission procedure allows total or partial exoneration of customs duties and taxes for goods imported temporarily from outside the EU and which will be re-exported in the same state.

Do not declare good which will be consumed.

champDescriptors.label: Do I have goods destined to be reexported ?
Reasons for temporary importation
champDescriptors.description: Check the box corresponding to the type of material imported temporarily. If you are only importing sports equipment other than weapons and ammunition for the competitions, you do not have to complete the form.
options: Material for the organisation of the event

champDescriptors.label: Principal place of use
champDescriptors.description: Mention the principal place where the goods will be used.

champDescriptors.label: Inventory of goods
champDescriptors.description: Join the file .pdf regarding the inventory of imported goods in accordance with Annex 6.5.8 of the Customs and Freight Guide edited by the Paris 2024 Organising Committee for the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

champDescriptors.label: Psychotropic or narcotic drugs and medicines
champDescriptors.description:
Only declare your Psychotropic or narcotic drugs and medicines if : 

- You are an individual and are transporting psychotropic or narcotic drugs or substances for more than 3 months
 - You are a doctor.

champDescriptors.label: I import psychotropic or narcotic drugs and medicines
Medical prescription
champDescriptors.description: If you are an individual, please bring a medical prescription in French or English, which must be presented to the customs service in case of control upon your arrival in France.

champDescriptors.label: Inventory of imported medicines, psychotropic or narcotic drugs
champDescriptors.description: If you are a doctor, please attach the inventory of imported medicines, psychotropic or narcotic drugs in french or english.

champDescriptors.label: I come from Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway or Switzerland and import narcotic and psychotropic drugs
Certificate given by the country of origin
champDescriptors.description: If you are an individual coming from one of the country listed above, please attach the certificate given by the administration of the country of origin.

champDescriptors.label: Medicinal products for veterinary use
champDescriptors.description: You are an individual or a veterinarian and you import veterinary drugs.

champDescriptors.label: Prescription
champDescriptors.description: If you are an individual, pleach attach a prescription of the imported veterinary drugs in French or English.

champDescriptors.label: Inventory of the imported veterinary drugs
champDescriptors.description: If you are a veterinarian, please attach an inventary of the imported veterinary drugs in French or English.

champDescriptors.label: I come from a listed country
champDescriptors.description:
Listed countries : 

Belarus
Central African Republic
China
Democratic Republic of Congo
Irak
Iran
Myanmar
Lebanon
Libya
North Korea
Russia
Somalia
South Sudan
Sudan
Syria
Venezuela
Yemen
Zimbabwe

champDescriptors.label: Authorisation of import
champDescriptors.description: If you are coming from one of the listed country above, please attach your authorisation.

champDescriptors.label: I import an animal
champDescriptors.description:
I come in France with my cat, my dog, a guide dog or my ferret.

Please note: an original health certificate will be required for your pet upon arrival in France.

champDescriptors.label: I come from a listed country or not
options: United States of America (including Guam, American Samoa, Northern Mariana Islands, Puerto Rico and U.S. Virgin Islands)
Ascension Island, BES Islands (Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba)
Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Singapore

champDescriptors.label: Certificat of Rabies serum antibody titer tests
champDescriptors.description: If you don't come from one of the listed country, please attach the certificat of rabies serum antibody titer tests.
